senses.sense_definition: A painting, carving, or series of small panels located along the lower edge of a large altarpiece.

examples.text: The museum displayed the <w>predella</w> separately from the main painting to highlight its detailed narrative scenes.
Each section of the <w>predella</w> panel illustrates a different miracle performed by the saint.

senses.sense_definition: A raised platform or step on which an altar stands in a Christian church.

examples.text: The priest ascended the <w>predella</w> to prepare the altar for the service.
Restoration efforts revealed the original marble design of the <w>predella</w> beneath the worn carpet.
